--- Part 1 ---

```{r}
md5 <- digest::getVDigest()
tibble(input =paste0(input, c(1:10000000))) %>% 
        mutate(output = md5(input, serialize = FALSE)) %>% 
        filter(str_starts(output, "000000"))
```


```{r}
input <- "iwrupvqb"
number <- seq_len(1000000)

md5 <- digest::getVDigest()

hash <- vapply(
  paste0(input, number),
  md5,
  FUN.VALUE = character(1),
  serialize = FALSE
)

which(substr(hash, 1, 5) == "00000")
```
